name: Crispy's Game
description:
A Valentine's day gift for a very special someone of mine. Features some basic pixel art, over 200 lines of dialogue (mostly for the help system), and 30 minutes of playtime!

(Includes copyrighted content by Fiddledo and Nintendo)

This project is open source on Github: https://github.com/limdingwen/Crispy-s-Game

This project is the February 2020 entry for 1 Game A Month.
